scripts.dev:tauri: sh -c 'case "${TAURI_ENV_PLATFORM:-desktop}" in ios) bun run dev:tauri-ios ;; android) bun run dev:tauri-android ;; *) bun run dev:tauri-all ;; esac'
scripts.build:web: VITE_PLATFORM=web vite build -c vite.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:tauri: sh -c 'case "${TAURI_ENV_PLATFORM:-desktop}" in ios) bun run build:tauri-ios ;; android) bun run build:tauri-android ;; *) bun run build:tauri-all ;; esac'
scripts.build:tauri-all: VITE_PLATFORM=tauri-all vite build -c vite.tauri-all.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:tauri-ios: VITE_PLATFORM=tauri-ios vite build -c vite.tauri-ios.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:tauri-android: VITE_PLATFORM=tauri-android vite build -c vite.tauri-android.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
